term: Keep your eye on the ball
definition: Stay focused on your goal.
explanation: Used to remind yourself to focus on what matters most in the interview.

definition: Maintaining calm and assurance in stressful situations.
explanation: Important when you're being evaluated in a high-stakes environment.
